me anuwa rajya kalamanakarana sahakara sewaya sandaha 1007 denekuda, kanishta sewayata (ka. ka. sa.) 306 denakuda bandawa ganu atha.wasara 2009 di pawathi rajya kalamanakarana sahakara sewaya samath wuwangen me wana wita 2500 denaku bandawa gena athi athara, ema wibhagaya samath sesu pirisen labagath lakunu anupiliwela anuwa nawa bandawa ganim sidu kerena athara eeta amatharawa wiwrutha tharaga wibhagaya samathwuwangen 306 deneku bandawa ganimata rajya paripalana amathyanshaya katayuthu yoda atha.me wibhaga samath wuwan sandaha me masa 12, 19, 20 dinawala sammukha parikshana pawathwenu athi bawa sandahan karana rajya paripalana amathyanshaya eeta amatharawa riyaduran bandawa ganime sammukha parikshana pawathwimata niyamitha bawada kiya.rajya paripalana amathyanshaye injineru sewaya magin idiriyedi thakshanika niladharin bandawa ganime prathipaththiyak sakas karamin pawathina bawada ema amathyanshaya pawasayi..

koti sanwidhanaye nayaka welupille prabhakarange upan dinaya samaru rajya nowana sanwidhanayakata ayath ek pudgalayek malesiyawe kiwlam kedahi di ath adanguwata gena thibe.ema siduwimata sambandha bawata saka kerena thawath pudgalayan haya denakuta bhara wana lesa malesiyanu polisiya danum di thibe.melesa athadanguwata path pudgalaya 1948 panathe 04 (01) waganthiyata anuwa prashna kirimwalata bhajanaya kara athi bawa polis pradhani tan shri kalid abubakar mahatha pawasayi.thrasthawadiyakuta pranama puda kirimata pudgalayan ek ras kirimata erehiwa ohuta chodana ella kara atha.

laksha sankhyatha bathimathun sahabhagiwana mema uthsawaya itha manawin pawathwimata awashya siyalu sanwidhana katayuthu sampurna wemin pawathi.sithulpawwa rajamaha wiharaya, galla yatagala rajamaha wiharaya, pradhana ashta maha wiharadhipathi, shasthrapathi, panditha, matarambaa hemarathana nahimiyange ha dayaka sabhawe sabhapathi, shri lanka prajathanthrika janarajaye janadhipathi wishwa kirthi shri thrisinhaladhishwara, aacharya.
